mean_cn: n. 告别辞；  adj. 告别的
mean_en: a speech that expresses good wishes for someone who is leaving :the act of saying goodbye in a formal way
word_etyma:
vale 再见 + dict 说话，断言 + ory 与...有关的 → adj. 告别的
n. 告别辞
short_phrase: give a valedictory speech at high school graduation
sentence: She gave a valedictory speech to the classmates she might never see again.
sentence_trans: 她对可能再也不会见面的同学们做了告别讲话。
